description: Detects PowerShell core DLL being loaded by an Office Product
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: PowerShell Core DLL Loaded Via Office Application
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Pp][Uu][Bb]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Ii][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Nn][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND dll.path:(/.*\\\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\.[Nn][Ii]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/))
